message: What are the current "official" version numbers that Kynetx supports via AppBuilder > Browser Extensions for all: IE, Firefox, Safari and Chrome? We have had some problems with Firefox 5 and 6. Also, when browsers do a general update, does the Kynetx team do regression testing and if so, how soon can we expect that to be done along with any revised extensions? Just looking for some general guidelines upon which we can base our expectations.
